Class Leaderboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Leaderboard
  • public class Leaderboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as the leaderboard for the game, storing the user profiles of the three users with the highest score for each of the five levels.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Leaderboard()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addProfile​(UserProfile newProfile)
      Adds a profile to one of the arrays if their score is high enough to be on the leaderboard for one of the five levels.

      Get the level 5 text file.
